title: News24.com | More arrests for lockdown looting and protests, cops in court over bootleg booze
description: A wave of looting in a Cape Town suburb has culminated in the arrest of four people, and in a different part of the city, three others were arrested for allegedly throwing stones at police and law enforcement officers.
content:
A wave of looting in a Cape Town suburb culminated in the arrest of four people, and in a different part of the city, three others were arrested for allegedly throwing stones at police and law enforcement officers.
